title: Sorely needed for my G2X, great but not perfect
comment: My previous phone had an led just for notifications, which I really missed from my LG G2X. I had to root my phone to get this to work, but there's a ton of customization for led brightness, blinking times, etc. One of the flaws that I've found in the app is that the vibration settings take over whatever mode your phone happens to be in. For example, I like to turn my phone between silent and vibrate. Unfortunately, when my phone is on silent, my texts, emails, etc will still vibrate my phone. It's too bad this app is still not being developed. I'd love it if there was some way for the LED notifications to follow what profile/mode my phone was using.

Also the biggest thing about this app: you know when the phone is charging, or finished charging. All the previous problems with Android 4.0.4 were fixed.

comment: This app exceeded my expectations and works great. Being an owner of strictly HTC devices in the past, I thought that I would miss having their LED notications....but this app is actually better. Seeing the touch keys light up looks a lot better than a single flashing light and you can set different pulse intervals for different notifications. LG needs to incorporate this function into is stock ROM and pay the dev his due.....this app is great!
Works above expectations. You can even set it to control touch light brightness under regular use. Perfect!
I was wrong it works! Not sure what happened
Why they didn't include an LED on the G2x, I will never understand...but this app is just as good. Awesome.

title: Absolutely FANTASTIC app
comment: Works as advertised and covers a BIG problem for the G2x. NO LED?!? c'mon... well no more. Thank you, Martin, for being smart enough to address this!

Love it! It stopped the LEDS from working when they suppose to so in uninstall reboot and reinstall. So far so good!

I like this apparently a lot it's. Tha bomb
